title.value: Application of Artificial intelligence in COVID-19-related geriatric care: A scoping review
title.justification: The title is directly taken from the header of the paper.
title.quote: Application of Artificial intelligence in COVID-19-related geriatric care: A scoping review

extractions.description: This scoping review summarizes the current evidence of AI use in the screening/monitoring, diagnosis, and/or treatment of COVID-19 among older adults, and identifies research gaps within AI and datasets related to geriatric COVID-19 care.

type.justification: The paper is conducting a scoping review, which involves collecting and analyzing data from various studies.
type.quote: This scoping review aimed to summarize the current evidence of artificial intelligence (AI) use...

name.justification: The paper explicitly discusses the application of AI in geriatric care, especially in the context of COVID-19.
name.quote: AI has been implemented in geriatric care during the COVID-19 pandemic.

name.justification: The focus is on geriatric care, as older adults are the primary target group in the study.
name.quote: ...the screening/monitoring, diagnosis, and/or treatment of COVID-19 among older adults.

name.justification: This is relevant as the study reviews AI applications specifically in the context of COVID-19.
name.quote: This review highlighted how the COVID-19 pandemic has accelerated the application of AI to protect older populations...
